name: HabitFlow - Supabase Demo
postCreateCommand: npm install && ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then SUPA_ARCH=amd64; elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ] || [ "$ARCH" = "arm64" ]; then SUPA_ARCH=arm64; else echo Unsupported architecture: $ARCH && exit 1; fi && curl -fsSL https://github.com/supabase/cli/releases/latest/download/supabase_linux_${SUPA_ARCH}.tar.gz | tar -xz -C /tmp && sudo mv /tmp/supabase /usr/local/bin/supabase && supabase --version
